steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cdeqv","text":"To purify GFP-tagged ATG13 IDR, the coding sequence for ATG13 (190-517aa), (206-517aa), (231-517aa), (190-205_231-517aa), (190-230aa), (190-205aa), or (206-230aa) into GST-TEV-EGFP-insert through cloning into a pGEX-4T1 vector (Plasmids available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cl0v0","text":"Mutants ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d5s9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ntc5","text":"3A (M196A/S197A/R199A) and ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ctiq","text":"11A (M196A/S197A/R199A/G202A/T204A/P205A/I207A/M208A/I210A/D213A/H214A) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fddc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ipsv","text":"are also expressed according to the protocol below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c729n","text":"After the transformation of the pGEX-4T1 vectors encoding the GFP-tagged ATG13 IDR in E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells (Novagen Cat# 70956-4), grow cells in 2x Tryptone Yeast extract (TY) medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continue at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":206,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":193,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":238,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dtmv0","text":"Once the cells reaches an OD600 of 0.8, induce the protein expression with   isopropyl β-D-1-t isopropyl β-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) for   at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":144,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":149,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"F2E4D8203AC711EF86880A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6p2m0","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation and resuspend in lysis buffer for GST-tagged proteins (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.4, 300 mM NaCl, 2 mM MgCl2, 5% glycerol, 1% Triton X-100, 2 mM β-mercaptoethanol, cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche), CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma), and DNase (Sigma)). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdgcg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pf07","text":"Lysis buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv1g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"agfpe","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7r4ht","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","10_0":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","8_0":"","9_0":""},"colTitles":["A","B"],"colWidths":[200,200],"data":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["pH","7.4"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["MgCl2","2 mM"],["glycerol","5%"],["Triton X-100","1%"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"],["cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche)",""],["CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma)",""],["DNase (Sigma)",""]],"guid":"3D8ADE25104F48979EAABEFF3C75E669","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"A_10":[2,1],"A_8":[2,1],"A_9":[2,1]},"printData":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["pH","7.4"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["MgCl2","2 mM"],["glycerol","5%"],["Triton X-100","1%"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"],["cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche)",""],["CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma)",""],["DNase (Sigma)",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6b5co","text":"Clear the lysates by centrifugation at   in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S-8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F5778FB739F711EFBA840A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2mgf8","text":"Collect the supernatant after centrifugation and incubate with pre-equilibrated Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads (GE Healthcare) for   at   on a roller to bind GST-TEV-EGFP-ATG13 IDR. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":136,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hdmf","text":"Centrifuge the samples to pellet the beads and remove the unbound lysate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13l42","text":"Wash the beads twice with wash buffer, once with high salt wash buffer, and two more times with wash buffer. {"blocks":[{"key":"7i15","text":"Incubate the beads   with TEV protease at  , to elute GFP-tagged ATG13 IDR from the beads. {"blocks":[{"key":"b0hlu","text":"To collect the supernatant, collect the beads by centrifugation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0fq5","text":"Wash the beads twice with   of wash buffer, and collect the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e65c2","text":"Pool the supernatant fractions, filter through a 0.45 µm syringe filter, concentrated with 10 or 30 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ja6","text":"Load the samples onto a pre-equilibrated Superose 200 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva) or S75 Increase 10/300 column (Cytiva) in case of the smaller peptides (190-230aa and smaller variants thereof). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5iqig","text":"Elute the proteins with SEC buffer.
